english.segment1: [Verse 1:]. Only One never having a beginning. Only One who reigns when everything is ending. High above. Glorious and true
english.segment2: [Pre-Chorus:]. We sing, Holy, the only uncreated One. Holy, the Light that was before the sun. You shine. And even when the stars have left the sky
english.segment3: [Chorus:]. You remain. Even when the earth is shaken. You remain. Even when our kings have fallen. Every mountain standing tall will crash into the sea. You were, You are, You will be. Only You remain
english.segment4: [Verse 2:]. Only One who stood before the universe. Only One authored life with just a word. Lord of all. There is none like You
english.segment5: [Bridge:]. Eternal. Immortal. Forever the same. (You remain)
